page.shortlink: ux list convert static data options
page.description: Options for configuring the target Static Data source.

section.title: Export data from SQL table to static data

description.p: If checked, data in the source SQL table will be imported and converted to a static data format.

section.title: Maximum number of rows to export

description.p: If data will be imported from the SQL data source, this property specifies the number of records to include. The default is 100.
The data format to use when the records from the SQL table are converted to static data. The following options are available:

item.name: CR-LF
item.description: Data will use a CR-LF delimited list. Each field will be separated by a pipe "|" character in the static data.

item.name: JSON
item.description: (Default) The data will be a JSON object.
